channel.title: techstars on Paperchain Blog
channel.description: Recent content in techstars on Paperchain Blog

item.title: Watch Paperchain's presentation from the Techstars Alchemist Blockchain Accelerator Demo Day
item.description:
On May 1st 2019, we wrapped up the Techstars Alchemist Blockchain Accelerator program, pitching to 200+ investors at the Metrograph Theater in New York City’s Lower East Side.

Countless hours went into preparing for this event and it was the culmination of a lot of hard work from all of us.

item.title: Paperchain Joins the Techstars Family — Launching Paperchain Beta Program for the Music Industry
item.description: We’re excited to share that Paperchain has been invited into the Techstars family, having been selected for the Alchemist Blockchain Techstars Accelerator, Techstars’ first dedicated blockchain accelerator.
